pkgmetadata.longdescription: NPMLE for Logistic-Cox Cure-Rate Model // Expectation- Maximization (EM) algorithm for point estimation and variance estimation to the nonparametric maximum likelihood estimator (NPMLE) for logistic-Cox cure-rate model with left truncation and right- censoring. See Hou, Chambers and Xu (2017) doi:10.1007/s10985-017-9415-2.
